pages.text: $(li)The Molten Glod Cluster is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_ingot)Gold Ingots$(/l) or the $(l:patchouli:weapons/blindsight_tongue_whip)Blindsight Tongue Whip$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can only obtain this item from a $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/voline)Voline$(/l).
